subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: English Channel galloped away with the $3 million Turf race Saturday at Monmouth Park, a special highlight for his owners, Jim and Terry Scatuorchio.
snippet: English Channel galloped away with the $3 million Turf race Saturday at Monmouth Park, a special highlight for his owners, Jim and Terry Scatuorchio.
